title: VMware’s Private Cloud Shift Under Broadcom
author: B Cameron Gain
description: VMware has seen shifts in its business model as it moves toward a subscription approach and a transformation in its portfolio as the company pivots to a platform-based private cloud delivery model.
cntitle: VMware私有云业务在博通收购下的转变
cndescription: VMware 正在转变其商业模式，转向订阅模式，并对其产品组合进行转型，致力于平台化的私有云交付模式。
